author: Gabrielle Reyes, Gabrielle Reyes
title: Thailand: Monks Use YouTube for Sanitary Mask Making Techniques
description: Buddhist monks in Thailand have recently been spotted wearing custom sanitary masks and shields while collecting alms, in their attempt to protect themselves from the Chinese coronavirus, Thai media reports revealed Tuesday.
content:
Buddhist monks in Thailand have recently been spotted wearing custom sanitary masks and shields while collecting alms to protect themselves from the Chinese coronavirus, Thai media reports revealed Tuesday.
